019
020import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsModifier;
023import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
024import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
025import net.tnemc.core.hook.papi.Placeholder;
026import net.tnemc.core.manager.PlaceholderManager;
027import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
028import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
029import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
030
031import java.math.BigDecimal;
032import java.util.Optional;
033
034/**
035 * TransactionPlaceholder
036 *
037 * @author creatorfromhell
038 * @since 0.1.4.0
039 */
040public class TransactionCurrencyPlaceholder implements Placeholder {
041
042  /**
043   * Retrieves the identifier associated with this symbol.
044   *
045   * @return The identifier as a string
046   */
047  @Override
048  public String identifier() {
049
050    return "tne_tx_currency";
051  }
052
053  /**
054   * Checks if the specified parameters are valid for this method.
055   *
056   * @param params The parameters to be checked
057   *
058   * @return True if the parameters are valid, false otherwise
059   */
060  @Override
061  public boolean applies(final String[] params) {
062
063    return params[0].equalsIgnoreCase("tx") && params.length >= 5
064           && params[4].equalsIgnoreCase("currency");
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Processes a request with the given account and parameters.
069   *
070   * @param account Optional account associated with the request
071   * @param params  Required parameters for the request
072   *
073   * @return Nullable string response from the request process
074   */
075  @Override
076  public @Nullable String onRequest(@Nullable final String account, @NotNull final String[] params) {
077
078    if(!MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.PlaceholderTransactions", false)) return null;
079
080    final Optional<Account> accountOptional = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(params[2]);
081
082    if(accountOptional.isEmpty()) {
083      return null;
084    }
085
086    final String type = PlaceholderManager.parseTransactionType(params[1]);
087
088    final BigDecimal amount;
089    try {
090      amount = new BigDecimal(params[3]);
091    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
092      return null;
093    }
094
095    final String region = TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion();
096    final Optional<Currency> currency = TNECore.eco().currency().find(params[5]);
097    if(currency.isEmpty()) {
098      return null;
099    }
100
101    final boolean message = params[params.length - 1].equalsIgnoreCase("message");
102
103
104    HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region, currency.get().getUid(), amount);
105    if(type.equalsIgnoreCase("take")) {
106      modifier = modifier.counter();
107    }
108
109    final Optional<Receipt> receiptOptional = PlaceholderManager.transact(accountOptional.get(), type,
110                                                                          modifier, message);
111
112    if(receiptOptional.isEmpty()) {
113      return null;
114    }
115    return "success";
116  }
117}
